name: Introduction to Astronomy
description: This course introduces the major areas of astronomy, including solar system astronomy, stars, galaxies, and cosmology.

name: Stellar Astrophysics
description: This course covers the physical properties of stars, including structure, formation, evolution, and death.

name: Galactic Astronomy and Extragalactic Astronomy
description: This course covers the structure, formation, and evolution of galaxies, as well as the large-scale structure of the Universe.

name: Observational Astronomy
description: This course covers the basics of astronomical observation, including the use of telescopes, instruments, and data analysis.
